title._content: First Congregational Church in Keene New Hampshire

description._content: TITLE First Congregational Church in Keene New Hampshire CREATOR Wardwell, Anne, Keene NH SUBJECT Churches - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION "Not only is the [Central] Square Keene's physical center, but also its visual one. Its focal point, the Congregational Church, is historically the most important building in the city. The play of light and shade across the front and tower give the building a dramatic appearance. The pristine white color which makes it visible from afar, the trees and open space in front all heighten the dramatic effect of this vertically-oriented building." [This is now the United Church of Christ.] PUBLISHER Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County DATE DIGITAL 20090226 DATE ORIGINAL 1975 RESOURCE TYPE slides FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykfok051 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known copyright restrictions.
